Quick search

User¶

class api.user.User(base_url, session, token)¶
create_user(username, password, first_name, last_name, email, title, dept, notes='Add Via API', admin='admin', user_type='analytics_developer')¶

Creating a new user

Parameters:
  • username – User name of the user being created
  • password – Password of the user being created
  • first_name – First Name of the user being created
  • last_name – Last Name of the user being created
  • email – Email of the user being created
  • title – User Title of the user being created
  • dept – Department of the user being created
  • notes – Note information of the user being created
  • admin – Whether the user is an Admin user or not
  • user_type – User type could be either analytics_developer, data_analyst, collaborator or bussiness_user
Returns:

Information of the new created user
delete_user(user_name)¶

Delete the User

Parameters:user_name – Username of the user to be deleted
Returns:Response of the delete action.
delete_user_if_exists(user_name)¶

Delete the User if the user exists or skip without throwing any error if user doesn’t exists

Parameters:user_name – Username of the user to be deleted
Returns:Response of the delete action.
get_user_id(user_name)¶

Getting the Id of the user

Parameters:user_name – User name of the user to query on
Returns:Id of the user
get_user_info(user_name)¶

Getting the Information of the user

Parameters:user_name – User name of the user to query on
Returns:Information of the user
get_users_list(per_page=100)¶

Getting a list of users

Parameters:per_page – how many users to search for each query
Returns:A List of users information
update_user_info(user_name, first_name=None, last_name=None, email=None, title=None, dept=None, notes=None, admin=None, user_type=None)¶

Updating for user information

Parameters:
  • user_name – Username of the user to be updated
  • first_name – Updated First Name of the user
  • last_name – Updated Last Name of the user
  • email – Updated Email of the user
  • title – Updated Title of the user
  • dept – Updated Department of the user
  • notes – Updated Notes of the user
  • admin – Updated Admin of the user
  • user_type – Updated User Type of the user
Returns:

Information of the updated user
